meanings.definition: The state or quality of being transient.
meanings.sent1: The transiences of life remind us to cherish each moment.
meanings.sent2: The beauty of nature lies in its transiences, ever-changing and fleeting.
meanings.sent3: The transiences of the butterfly's flight brought a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, a transiences of joy in the air.
meanings.sent5: The transiences of the sunset painted the sky in hues of gold and pink.

meanings.definition: The transient or temporary nature of something.
meanings.sent1: We must embrace the transiences of youth and age gracefully.
meanings.sent2: The transiences of fashion trends make it exciting to experiment with new styles.
meanings.sent3: The transiences of the internet meme world can be both hilarious and puzzling.
meanings.sent4: His love was like a fleeting transiences, here one moment and gone the next.
meanings.sent5: The transiences of the seasons bring a sense of renewal and change to the world.
